title: cant duo with with Plat friend when i finished of the season in plat !?!?
body: title. im trying to duo with my friend who finished the season in plat and i cant join him tho i finished in plat too but my friend who finished in bronze can join him in a Solo/duo ranked

replies.body: Like [previous seasons](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ), you can group up with friends who are one tier between you.  In this case, Platinum is a few tiers above Bronze so it won't be possible to queue until that gap closes.  Good luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=X2ApwskJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-07T18:37:05.160+0000)
>
> Like previous seasons, you can group up with friends who are one tier between you.  In this case, Platinum is a few tiers above Bronze so it won't be possible to queue until that gap closes.  Good luck!

no you dont understand i finished season 6 plat 4 he finished plat 3 yet i still cant play with him 
it says our rank differnace is too high

@Porocles

I'm having this same issue. I finished Diamond V while my buddy was Platinum 2 - went duo placements with him today and it says our ranks are too far apart.
Out of curiosity, was this friend disqualified from season rewards during 2016?
No, neither of us were disqualified.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=X2ApwskJ,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2016-12-07T19:28:16.405+0000)
>
> Out of curiosity, was this friend disqualified from season rewards during 2016?

no he wasnt but i was does that not allow me to duo with him ??

Players who were unranked or disqualified from season 6 rewards are determined as Unranked, per the[ Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h4).  Meaning someone who was platinum would not be able to queue with an unranked player. 

 If you or your friend were disqualified during season 6, you'll both need to finish placements and be within eligible tiers to play together.

> [{quoted}](name=Season 7 ADC LUL,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=X2ApwskJ,comment-id=0000000100010000,timestamp=2016-12-07T19:31:03.349+0000)
>
> no he wasnt but i was does that not allow me to duo with him ?? becuase if it doesnt then thats pretty dumb tbh

> [{quoted}](name=Kantoweru,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=X2ApwskJ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-12-07T19:16:56.887+0000)
>

> 
> I'm having this same issue. I finished Diamond V while my buddy was Platinum 2 - went duo placements with him today and it says our ranks are too far apart.

yet i get placed with all PLATS like come on riot
